name: admin.roles.addAssignments
desc: Adds members to the specified role with the specified scopes

entity_ids.desc: List of the entity IDs for which roles will be assigned. These can be Org IDs, Team IDs or Channel IDs.

role_id.desc: ID of the role to which users will be assigned.

user_ids.desc: List of IDs from the users to be added to the given role.

errors.failed_for_some_entities: At least one role scope ID was invalid
errors.failed_for_some_users: At least one user ID was invalid
errors.failed_for_some_users_and_entities: At least one role scope ID was invalid
errors.feature_not_enabled: This API is currently not enabled.
errors.invalid_actor: This API is only enabled for the Admins/Owners.
errors.invalid_role_id: The role type passed does not exist.
errors.no_valid_entities: None of the entities passed were valid.
errors.no_valid_users: None of the users passed were valid.
errors.too_many_entities: More than 10 role scopes were passed.
